dc_title_s: Village Boundaries of West Bengal, India, 2011
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents village boundaries in West Bengal, India. Points of all villages are shown linked to Primary Census Abstract 2011. This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for village level demographic analysis within basic applications to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. Coastal boundary aligned with imagery, no gaps in polygon, no topological errors, aggregate and % figures verified ML InfoMap. (2014). Village Boundaries of West Bengal, India, 2011. ML InfoMap. Availabile at: http://purl.stanford.edu/gn598rt4477 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
